speaker: Clinician
text: So, when you mentioned the dizziness, it was just at the beginning, right? And it's, uh, resolved now?

speaker: Patient
text: Yeah, it was mostly in the first couple of weeks. I was a bit worried at first, but it seems to have settled down.

speaker: Clinician
text: That's good to hear. And how are you managing with the reminders for your doses? I know you mentioned your work schedule can be a bit unpredictable.

speaker: Patient
text: I've been using my phone to set alarms. It's helped, but sometimes if I'm in the middle of a project, I, uh, tend to ignore them.

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. Maybe we can think of a backup plan, like a pill organizer or, um, a different type of reminder that might catch your attention better?

speaker: Patient
text: Yeah, maybe a pill organizer could work. I just need something more, uh, in my face, you know?
